channel.title: Why is my server showing as offline?!
channel.description:
I would like to know why my server is now showing as offline on my status page..
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=shatteredscape.no-ip.org

item.title: Why is my server showing as offline?!
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Is this advertising?

Oh well, umm well first off is the server running? If yes, then can other people get on your server?

If the first answer is no the turn it on. If the second one is no then redo your portforwarding.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is my server showing as offline?!
